item.description:
The Research Agency is having their Paranormal Convention
At the Milford Howard Johnsons.

It will be held from 11 am to 6 pm.

Agenda

http://www.sgra.org/p...

www.sgra.org/paracon/agenda.htm

Directions I - 95 Exit 39A

When you go in between the Greek Diner and Hotel drive up to the
Mini Golf. Park near the mini Golf. As you walk out of the parking lot,
Go straight across into the Hotel for the conference area.
If necessary, rest rooms are to the left as you go in.
The conference rooms are straight ahead.

There will be Vendors that charge for products.
There will be Psychics who charge for readings.
Book Sales and Signings.
They are selling a booklet for the event.

Please bring your cameras and let me know if you get
Any Orb shots.

The Presenters are;

Jon Nowinski
SGRA Founder & Director

Diane Bajorinas
&
Thomas Cooney for
Ghost Phenomen

Mandy Oram
The Circle of the Sacred Well

http://www.thecircleo...

www.thecircleofthesacredwell.org

http://www.meetup.com...

www.meetup.com/The-Circle-of-the-Sacred-Well/

Andrew Neblett

“Metaphysics Of Life”

Nick Roesler
MUFON
&
Philip Imbrogno
for UFOs

Activities

http://www.sgra.org/p...

www.sgra.org/paracon/about.htm

Informative Presentations

Interactive Workshops

Meal Events - You Must Buy Meal Tickets

Trivia Games and Contests

Movie Screenings

Vendor Activities

Panel Discussions

Q & A

If you want a program booklet then you must buy it.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/index/

Weather permitting there might be Mini - Golf at the
Course over by the Parking Lot.

Last year there was coffee, soda and snacks available.

Please bring your questions and comments regarding
Unknown Topics such as Conspiracies, Ghost and the Paranormal.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org

For more details and some things can be
Purchased on line.


Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: If I do go I will have my Purple Back Pack at the Paracon.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ will attend the 09 Paracon on Sat. June 6
